User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110208 Firefox/4.0b12pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110208 Firefox/4.0b12pre

if you open it up you will see that the top part of the screen gets coverd black

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. go on the website http://www.retroemu.com/forum/index.php?/topic/509-gow2-funny-bug-read/
Actual Results:  
i get the top coverd black

Expected Results:  
should just display the pages normaly with out black top
